body: Monte Carlo AI keeps re-equipping equipments on the same creature.
author: [BlueTemp...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/106469047315539476308/)
title: AI wasting mana on equipment

comments.body:
Thank you for the report.

This might be related to an issue we hope is resolved ( issue 26 ). Now, I'm having a hard time trying to reproduce this. I played multiple test games and in those the MCTS AI doesn't do what you describe. That doesn't mean I think it can't be, but it means I'll need more details of what the game looked like when you saw this happening. Things like the card it kept re-equipping, what equipment was it, remaining life, anything that can help us reproduce this issue will get us closer to a possible solution.

Thanks.
comments.author: [BeHold...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/116281131070537299190/)

comments.body: It had a generated elf deck, I don't really remember anything else, IIRC it was 2 equipments : one that makes you draw cards when the creature deals damage to the opponent, and one that gives infect.
